### Janitorial Services – PSEC West Vancouver Laboratory

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement

Solicitation Number: 30004446

The Fisheries and Oceans Canada, under Canadian Coast Guard, hereby issues a notice of proposed procurement (NPP) for Janitorial Services at the Pacific Science Enterprise Center (PSEC) West Vancouver Laboratory.

#### Background and Objective

This procurement is to obtain janitorial services for the PSEC West Vancouver Laboratory, Monday to Friday, excluding holidays. The contract will cover cleaning of all exposed surfaces inside the buildings, including walls, floors, furniture, plumbing, handrails, grilles, and windows (_inside and outside_). The contracted parties must adhere to a set of specific security guidelines and protocols to ensure the sensitive research equipment and facilities are left undisturbed.

#### Scope of Work

- Cleaning of exposed surfaces, including walls, floors, furniture, plumbing, handrails, grilles, and windows (inside and outside).
- Turning off all unnecessary lighting and securing the premises before leaving.
- Not disturbing ongoing scientific experiments, equipment, or staff working areas.
- Not tampering with or disposing of special waste, including radioactive and biomedical waste, without proper authorization.

#### Security Requirements

The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) level issued by the Canadian and International Industrial Security Directorate (CISD) of Public Work and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) for access to DFO premises. Each resource working on this contract must also hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS granted by CISD of PWGSC for access to the DFO premises.

#### Period of Contract

The contract will commence January 1, 2024, and end December 31, 2024, with an option to extend for five additional one-year periods.

#### Trade Agreements

This requirement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

#### Contract Authority

Name: Simon Cousineau
Phone: 343-548-1568
Email: simon.cousineau@dfo-mpo.gc.ca, cc: DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfompo.gc.ca
